_comment_cronSchedule: How often the bot checks for alerts to run (every minute by default)
_comment_timezone: Timezone for daily alerts (IANA timezone format, e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London', 'Asia/Tokyo')
_comment_dailyAlertHour: Hour (0-23) when daily alerts should fire in the configured timezone (9 = 9 AM)
